#summary Instructions how to build from source and make a release

Build native code (only needed if src/com/litrik/eclipse/xps/core/LEDs.c was changed)
  # Execute build/build.xml

Prepare the release:
  # Update doc/changes.html
  # Increase Bundle-Version in META-INF/MANIFEST.MF

Build/export the plug-in:
  # Select "Export..." in context menu of the project
  # Select "Deployable plug-ins and features"
  # Click "Next >"
  # Enter directory to export the plug-in

Release the new version of the plug-in:
  # Upload the new release to [http://code.google.com/p/eclipse-xps/downloads/list the download page] and label it as "Featured"
  # Remove the "Featured" label from the previous release
  # Update RecentChanges on the wiki
  # Update the plug-in details at [http://www.eclipseplugincentral.com/Web_Links-index-req-viewlink-cid-840.html Eclipse Plug-in Central]
